name: Slime Mania
description:
Slime Mania - You are the slime capturer you needs to capture slimes before the time runs out! Watch out for bomb slimes as they will blow up your slimes! 

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE.

HOW TO PLAY:

Controls: Mouse, 

Escape or P to Pause the game.

The goal of the game is to drag slimes into the pen while trying to get the best multiplier you can that is randomly assigned to a slime type indicated at the top of the screen within the time limit.

Note: There are bomb slimes that will destroy slimes that they encounter you can however click on them 3 times to convert them to a random slime that is not a bomb slime.
